Title: Gene Hackman's pacemaker activity suggests he died several days before he was found
Description:
Hackman's pacemaker was last active on Feb.
17, according to the Santa Fe County Sheriff Adan Mendoza.

Title: The Housing Theory of Everything
Description:
Western housing shortages do not just prevent many from ever affording their own home.
They also drive inequality, climate change, low productivity growth, obesity, and even falling fertility rates.
